name: Devil's Dungeon (itch) (akmcguir)
description:
When a cat makes a deal to save her friends life, what will happen when they take her friend back?

Follow Kitty, a black cat on a mission to save her friend from a deal gone wrong. When Sheep was in the hospital, what Kitty thought was an angel offered a deal to help Sheep get better. When the demon takes Sheep back, its up to Kitty to go on a journey in his dungeon and save her!

Game Trailer
